import React, { useEffect, useState, useRef } from "react"; import { useSelector,useDispatch } from "react-redux"; import {getAddCartData} from '../../actions/products'; export default function CartData(props) { const {settoggleModal} = props.cartDetails; const dispatch = useDispatch(); console.log(props.cartDetails.toggleModal.pid); useEffect(()=>{ const product = { 'id':props.cartDetails.toggleModal.pid } dispatch(getAddCartData(product)); },[]); return ( <>
